title: FIT File EP3: Apple Vision Pro, Zwift Layoffs, Wahoo KICKR CORE Zwift One, and Burritos
content:
﻿

For those not subscribed to the FIT File (it’s free!) via your regular podcast app or on YouTube, here’s a quick post with the highlights from the most recent episode.

In this episode, we talk about our first and continued usage of Apple Vision Pro, the big Zwift Layoffs and how Zwift might need to rethink its long-term strategy towards profitability and investor happiness. Plus, Wahoo and Zwift’s new KICKR CORE Zwift One smart trainer, and Strava’s free burrito competition gone wild.

Here are the timing/chapter markers for each (automatically in the YouTube video above, both on YouTube the video platform, and YouTube Music app for listening to podcasts):
